description: This file defines a React functional component 'AllureEmbed' that displays an iframe of the Allure report for a given job ID. It conditionally renders content based on the presence of the 'jobId' prop and utilizes an external API call to get the report URL.

methods.name: AllureEmbed({ jobId })
methods.description: React functional component that renders an iframe with the Allure report for a specific job ID.
